scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p .build-temp && (test -f src/app/api/qr/\[slug\]/email-vcard/route.ts && mv src/app/api/qr/\[slug\]/email-vcard/route.ts .build-temp/email-vcard-route.ts.bak || true) && (test -f src/app/qr/\[slug\]/opengraph-image.tsx && mv src/app/qr/\[slug\]/opengraph-image.tsx .build-temp/opengraph-image.tsx.bak || true)
scripts.postbuild: if [ -f .build-temp/email-vcard-route.ts.bak ]; then mv .build-temp/email-vcard-route.ts.bak src/app/api/qr/\[slug\]/email-vcard/route.ts && mv .build-temp/opengraph-image.tsx.bak src/app/qr/\[slug\]/opengraph-image.tsx 2>/dev/null || true && rmdir .build-temp 2>/dev/null || true; fi
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.restart: pkill -f 'next dev' || true && npm run clean && npm run dev
